other.name: 1password
other.description: Set up and use 1Password CLI (op). Use when installing the CLI, enabling desktop app integration, signing in (single or multi-account), or reading/injecting/running secrets via op.

other.name: blogwatcher
other.description: Monitor blogs and RSS/Atom feeds for updates using the blogwatcher CLI.

other.name: blucli
other.description: BluOS CLI (blu) for discovery, playback, grouping, and volume.

other.name: bluebubbles
other.description: Use when you need to send or manage iMessages via BlueBubbles (recommended iMessage integration). Calls go through the generic message tool with channel="bluebubbles".

other.name: camsnap
other.description: Capture frames or clips from RTSP/ONVIF cameras.

other.name: canvas
other.description: Display HTML content on connected OpenClaw nodes (Mac app, iOS, Android).

other.name: clawhub
other.description: Use the ClawHub CLI to search, install, update, and publish agent skills from clawhub.com. Use when you need to fetch new skills on the fly, sync installed skills to latest or a specific version, or publish new/updated skill folders with the npm-installed clawhub CLI.

other.name: eightctl
other.description: Control Eight Sleep pods (status, temperature, alarms, schedules).

other.name: food-order
other.description: Reorder Foodora orders + track ETA/status with ordercli. Never confirm without explicit user approval. Triggers: order food, reorder, track ETA.

other.name: gemini
other.description: Gemini CLI for one-shot Q&A, summaries, and generation.

other.name: gog
other.description: Google Workspace CLI for Gmail, Calendar, Drive, Contacts, Sheets, and Docs.

other.name: goplaces
other.description: Query Google Places API (New) via the goplaces CLI for text search, place details, resolve, and reviews. Use for human-friendly place lookup or JSON output for scripts.

other.name: himalaya
other.description: CLI to manage emails via IMAP/SMTP. Use `himalaya` to list, read, write, reply, forward, search, and organize emails from the terminal. Supports multiple accounts and message composition with MML (MIME Meta Language).

other.name: imsg
other.description: iMessage/SMS CLI for listing chats, history, watch, and sending.

other.name: local-places
other.description: Search for places (restaurants, cafes, etc.) via Google Places API proxy on localhost.

other.name: mcporter
other.description: Use the mcporter CLI to list, configure, auth, and call MCP servers/tools directly (HTTP or stdio), including ad-hoc servers, config edits, and CLI/type generation.

other.name: model-usage
other.description: Use CodexBar CLI local cost usage to summarize per-model usage for Codex or Claude, including the current (most recent) model or a full model breakdown. Trigger when asked for model-level usage/cost data from codexbar, or when you need a scriptable per-model summary from codexbar cost JSON.

other.name: nano-banana-pro
other.description: Generate or edit images via Gemini 3 Pro Image (Nano Banana Pro).

other.name: nano-pdf
other.description: Edit PDFs with natural-language instructions using the nano-pdf CLI.

other.name: notion
other.description: Notion API for creating and managing pages, databases, and blocks.

other.name: obsidian
other.description: Work with Obsidian vaults (plain Markdown notes) and automate via obsidian-cli.

other.name: openai-whisper
other.description: Local speech-to-text with the Whisper CLI (no API key).

other.name: openai-whisper-api
other.description: Transcribe audio via OpenAI Audio Transcriptions API (Whisper).

other.name: openhue
other.description: Control Philips Hue lights/scenes via the OpenHue CLI.

other.name: oracle
other.description: Best practices for using the oracle CLI (prompt + file bundling, engines, sessions, and file attachment patterns).

other.name: ordercli
other.description: Foodora-only CLI for checking past orders and active order status (Deliveroo WIP).

other.name: peekaboo
other.description: Capture and automate macOS UI with the Peekaboo CLI.

other.name: sag
other.description: ElevenLabs text-to-speech with mac-style say UX.

other.name: session-logs
other.description: Search and analyze your own session logs (older/parent conversations) using jq.

other.name: sherpa-onnx-tts
other.description: Local text-to-speech via sherpa-onnx (offline, no cloud)

other.name: skill-creator
other.description: Create or update AgentSkills. Use when designing, structuring, or packaging skills with scripts, references, and assets.

other.name: songsee
other.description: Generate spectrograms and feature-panel visualizations from audio with the songsee CLI.

other.name: sonoscli
other.description: Control Sonos speakers (discover/status/play/volume/group).

other.name: spotify-player
other.description: Terminal Spotify playback/search via spogo (preferred) or spotify_player.

other.name: summarize
other.description: Summarize or extract text/transcripts from URLs, podcasts, and local files (great fallback for “transcribe this YouTube/video”).

other.name: things-mac
other.description: Manage Things 3 via the `things` CLI on macOS (add/update projects+todos via URL scheme; read/search/list from the local Things database). Use when a user asks OpenClaw to add a task to Things, list inbox/today/upcoming, search tasks, or inspect projects/areas/tags.

other.name: tmux
other.description: Remote-control tmux sessions for interactive CLIs by sending keystrokes and scraping pane output.

other.name: trello
other.description: Manage Trello boards, lists, and cards via the Trello REST API.

other.name: voice-call
other.description: Start voice calls via the OpenClaw voice-call plugin.

other.name: wacli
other.description: Send WhatsApp messages to other people or search/sync WhatsApp history via the wacli CLI (not for normal user chats).

other.name: weather
other.description: Get current weather and forecasts (no API key required).

data.name: apple-notes
data.description: Manage Apple Notes via the `memo` CLI on macOS (create, view, edit, delete, search, move, and export notes). Use when a user asks OpenClaw to add a note, list notes, search notes, or manage note folders.

data.name: bear-notes
data.description: Create, search, and manage Bear notes via grizzly CLI.

productivity.name: apple-reminders
productivity.description: Manage Apple Reminders via the `remindctl` CLI on macOS (list, add, edit, complete, delete). Supports lists, date filters, and JSON/plain output.

dev.name: coding-agent
dev.description: Run Codex CLI, Claude Code, OpenCode, or Pi Coding Agent via background process for programmatic control.

dev.name: github
dev.description: Interact with GitHub using the `gh` CLI. Use `gh issue`, `gh pr`, `gh run`, and `gh api` for issues, PRs, CI runs, and advanced queries.

comm.name: discord
comm.description: Use when you need to control Discord from OpenClaw via the discord tool: send messages, react, post or upload stickers, upload emojis, run polls, manage threads/pins/search, create/edit/delete channels and categories, fetch permissions or member/role/channel info, set bot presence/activity, or handle moderation actions in Discord DMs or channels.

comm.name: slack
comm.description: Use when you need to control Slack from OpenClaw via the slack tool, including reacting to messages or pinning/unpinning items in Slack channels or DMs.

media.name: gifgrep
media.description: Search GIF providers with CLI/TUI, download results, and extract stills/sheets.

media.name: openai-image-gen
media.description: Batch-generate images via OpenAI Images API. Random prompt sampler + `index.html` gallery.

media.name: video-frames
media.description: Extract frames or short clips from videos using ffmpeg.

sys.name: healthcheck
sys.description: Host security hardening and risk-tolerance configuration for OpenClaw deployments. Use when a user asks for security audits, firewall/SSH/update hardening, risk posture, exposure review, OpenClaw cron scheduling for periodic checks, or version status checks on a machine running OpenClaw (laptop, workstation, Pi, VPS).
